text: Under the Skin is a 1994 Australian anthology television series. It consisted of twelve half-hour dramas, each reflecting different aspects of Australian cultural and regional diversity. Under the Skin was awarded Best Mini-Series or Telefeature at the 1994 Australian Film Institute Awards, for the episode "The Long Ride". == Episodes == {| class="wikitable" !No. !Title !Director !Writer !Starring |- |1 |"Dino, Where You Been?" |Aleksi Vellis |John Ruane |Arthur Angel, Nadine Garner, Frankie J.
